summary: The diff adds a shared INR formatting utility (formatINR) and updates several key storefront/admin/nursery pages/components to use it (ProductCard, ProductDetailsPage, CartPage, CheckoutPage, MyOrdersPage, AdminProductsPage, NurseryDashboardPage). However, due to truncation and limited file coverage, it’s not fully evidenced that *all* monetary displays across the entire app (including all totals/summary sections and any other admin/nursery price displays) are converted and that no user-facing "$" remains anywhere.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all cart line-item prices, subtotals, and totals render in INR (₹) (not $).
missing_requirements.reason: CartPage changes are truncated; line item price formatting is shown, but the order summary section (where subtotals/totals are typically rendered) is not visible in the diff summary, so full compliance is not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update all admin/nursery views that show prices so they render in INR (₹) (not $).
missing_requirements.reason: Only AdminProductsPage and NurseryDashboardPage are shown modified; the requirement calls out all admin/nursery management views that display prices. The diff summary does not provide evidence for any other potential admin/nursery pages/components that might also display prices.

missing_requirements.requirement: No user-facing currency strings in the app UI contain the "$" symbol after the change.
missing_requirements.reason: While a shared formatter is added and used in several files, the diff summary does not demonstrate an audit/refactor across all locations where currency may be displayed. Truncation and unmodified files mean remaining "$" occurrences cannot be ruled out based on provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced ProductCard image handling with imageUrls[0] rendering and an onError DOM-injected SVG fallback.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is limited to currency display/formatting changes; image loading/fallback behavior is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: ProductDetailsPage image gallery / thumbnail selection and fallback behavior changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for image gallery improvements—only INR currency formatting refactors.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (ProductDetailsPage description mentions responsive image gallery/thumbnails and fallback)
